last_episode_to_air.name: Seeing Double
last_episode_to_air.overview: Janice encounters a creature that looks like her. Rebecca starts acting strange, but then later seems to be her old self.

name: BatPat
overview: Bat Pat follows the spooky and comical animated adventures of Bat Pat (who, in case you couldn't guess, is a talking bat) and his friends Martin, Leo and Rebecca Silver as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home of Fogville.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Bat Pat follows the spooky and comical animated adventures of Bat Pat (who, in case you couldn't guess, is a talking bat) and his friends Martin, Leo and Rebecca Silver as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home of Fogville.

episodes.name: Boil, Bubble, A Witch in Trouble
episodes.overview: A witch flying on a broom is terrorising Fogville! Bat Pat and the kids track the witch to her creepy cottage in the Whispering Forest and discover the witch doesn't mean to scare anyone she's just a terrible flyer and can't control her broom. Martin helps the witch into the modern age by designing flight stabilisers for her broom.

episodes.name: Headless Houseguest
episodes.overview: Everyone's peaceful Halloween is disturbed by a galloping horseman riding through Fogville terrorizing trick-or-treaters. Rebecca's determined to solve the mystery and discovers that the rider is the infamous "Headless Horace" who legend says rides through town in search of souls to steal. But the kids and Bat Pat discover that Horace isn't looking for souls to steal.

episodes.name: Survival of the Trolliest
episodes.overview: A reality TV show host, Tiger Leatherheart, discovers a mysterious and fierce creature on Black Skull Island while filming his show. After Tiger vows to capture the creature, Rebecca is determined to save the creature from Tiger. The kids and Bat Pat travel to Black Skull Island and, under the guise of "helping" Tiger find the creature, they set off to find the creature before Tiger does.

episodes.name: Howl at the Moon
episodes.overview: Something is breaking into Mr. Basset's pet shop at night. The kids and Bat Pat stake out the pet shop and discover it's a werewolf. They track the werewolf to the Whispering Forest hoping to discover the reason why it's sneaking into Mr. Basset's pet shop.

episodes.name: An Uncomfortable Situation
episodes.overview: The world famous King Toots Mummy Exhibit has arrived, but it's missing one mummy: King Toots! Rebecca believes it's a mummy's curse and that Toots is walking around Fogville in need of help, while Martin is convinced the mummy's been stolen by thieves.

episodes.name: The Lady in the Mirror
episodes.overview: A ghost is haunting the mirrors of Fogville creating a town-wide panic. The kids and Bat Pat discover the ghost is Mrs. Rufelle Tailfeathers. She's a bald ghost and is looking for a new look as she's been wearing the same wig for 200 years.

episodes.name: Something's Fisgy
episodes.overview: Sea monsters in Fogville? When Salomon Trotter runs into a shadowy creature on the pier, he's convinced that a sea monster is on the loose: a Fishsquatch. Rebecca is determined to see it while Martin is convinced that sea monsters are scientifically impossible.

episodes.name: Pirates Of Fogville!
episodes.overview: Out on the water in his rowboat, Salomon Trotter has a close encounter with a ghostly ship from the fog. The next morning, the opening of the restored Fogville Lighthouse has the Silver family and Bat Pat abuzz with excitement, but Trotter tries to stop it for fear the ghost ship will return.

episodes.name: Wail of a Tale
episodes.overview: Something in Dreary Swamp is wailing at night and it's keeping everyone in Fogville awake. The whole town is sleepy during the day and extra grumpy! And no one is more annoyed than Ivan Templeton who suspects it might be a supernatural creature and sets out to capture it.

episodes.name: Two Big Left Feet
episodes.overview: Melody Forte encounters a big, hairy creature lurking outside her window while watching the TV show "Cha Cha with the Stars." When the hairy creature shows up at Martin's school dance, the kids and Bat Pat realise it's Bigfoot. When they find Bigfoot in the Whispering Forest, they discover he's been appearing in Fogville because he wants to learn how to dance.

episodes.name: A Big Stink
episodes.overview: After a mysterious creature takes a shower at the Mayor's house, the kids and Bat Pat follow the clues to Dreary Swamp and discover the culprit is a swamp monster! He's been extra smelly lately. He's in a book club with a goblin and an ogre, but they can't stand to be near him anymore! He's been trying to find something to find a way to smell better.

episodes.name: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: After several shops in Fogville are ruined the night before Valentine's Day, Rebecca is convinced there's a Valentine's Day creature that wants to ruin Valentine's Day. But it ends up being an ogre named Grundulla that wants a makeover for her big Valentine's Day date with an ogre from across the swamp. Joined by Natty, the kids and Bat Pat do their best to give Grundulla and awesome makeover.

episodes.name: Love at the First Fright
episodes.overview: There's a new teacher in Martin's class. Martin's a bit taken by her, but there's something odd about Ms. Brittle: she's very nervous and jumpy and is convinced a creature is following her. Rebecca thinks she might be cursed, but the kids come to realise that a creature is indeed following her… because he wants to ask her out on a date!

episodes.name: Such a Fright
episodes.overview: While bird watching in Fogville Park, Salomon is spooked by a ghost that's haunting the park. The kids and Bat Pat learn of Salomon's encounter when he refuses to go back to the park to bird watch with Martin. Rebecca's eager to meet the ghost and heads to the park with Leo, Martin and Bat Pat.

episodes.name: The Thing Under the Bed
episodes.overview: On a sleepover at the Silvers, their friend Phil's sleep is disturbed when he discovers a monster under the bed. The monster known as Melvin just needs a place to sleep, and the Silvers offer him a temporary home. But his first night is a disaster for Martin - Melvin's a restless sleeper who tosses and turns, sleepwalks and gets up in the middle of the night for water.

episodes.name: Monster Jam
episodes.overview: When strange things start to happen with the basketballs at school, Rebecca thinks there's a ball revolt going on. But when the kids and Bat Pat encounter some small green creatures by the school equipment locker, they follow them into the Whispering Forest and realize it's a group of goblins who are trying to "borrow" a basketball.

episodes.name: Gnome Alone
episodes.overview: Something is stealing garden gnomes from the gardens of Fogville! The kids and Bat Pat discover the thief is a real gnome! The gnome, whose name is Fudwick, isn't very bright and he's convinced that all the garden gnome ornaments in Fogville are real gnomes turned into statues by the people of Fogville.

episodes.name: How to Restrain Your Dragon
episodes.overview: Strange noises - and the occasional blast of fire - are coming from the Whispering Forest. But the Silvers don't know that yet because Elisabeth has the family taste-testing her chili for the Fogville Chili Cookoff. Unfortunately, it's not spicy enough. Leo inadvertently volunteers to find a super spicy pepper to provide some tasty heat.

episodes.name: Over the Rainbow
episodes.overview: Numerous rainbows appear over the Whispering Forest and turn it into a bright and happy place. The creatures of the Whispering Forest hate bright and happy, so they began fleeing into Fogville and even take over Natty's barn. But worst of all, the bright rainbows have made Martin's favorite Goth musician, Gothra, turn happy and sing happy songs.

episodes.name: Ocean's Roar
episodes.overview: Summer has officially started and the people of Fogville are hitting the beach, including the Silver family and Bat Pat. But their plans are derailed when a series of huge "potholes" in the street have jammed the traffic. The kids and Bat Pat eventually realise that the potholes are really footprints caused by a T-Rex that had been frozen in a block of ice.

episodes.name: Frozen to the Bones
episodes.overview: While camping at Camp Sunny View, Bat Pat and the kids hear a creepy rattling sound coming from the forest. They realize the creepy rattling is Bones the Skeleton's bones rattling together because he's so cold! They take Bones to stay with Natty, where they solve his cold problem by putting Bones the Skeleton inside a stuffed scarecrow.

episodes.name: Puppy Love
episodes.overview: The kids and Bat Pat discover a cute stray puppy and take it home with them. The puppy loves to play fetch, but the first time Leo is alone with the puppy, it barks and its head morphs into a terrifying demon dog. Leo tries desperately to make the puppy bark in front of the others to show them the transformation, but the puppy never does.

episodes.name: Tooth or Consequences
episodes.overview: Something spooky comes into Rex and Melissa's rooms while they're sleeping and makes horrible noises. Rebecca notices an interesting part of the mystery: Both of them had recently lost a tooth. Rebecca fakes Martin losing a tooth to get the creature to visit their house, but the "beast" is in fact… the Tooth Fairy!

episodes.name: Two Heads Aren't Better
episodes.overview: Phil Mooney's heard a lot of mysterious noises coming from the Fogville Junkyard, and is convinced that something spooky lurks around the wrecked cars and broken refrigerators. But that won't stop the Silvers and Bat Pat.

episodes.name: Just My Luck
episodes.overview: Something strange is lurking in the bushes at Fogville Park and swiping items from picnickers. When the creature later tries to swipe a bowl of popcorn from Leo and Bat Pat, the gang realises it's a leprechaun named Seamus. Seamus is the world's most unlucky leprechaun and he's searching for his lost pot of gold.

episodes.name: Please don't Make a Wish
episodes.overview: Phil Mooney wished that someone would help with the trash, and he ended up inside the can at the curb. Did his wish come true? Leo wishes for a high-tech skateboard and it appears almost like magic. Sure, it's a little handmade and doesn't quite work like the real thing, but his wish did come true, right?

episodes.name: Ghost of a Chance
episodes.overview: A Ghost bike is riding around Fogville and people are accusing Martin of being behind the odd events as they claim he's the one they see riding the bike. The kids and Bat Pat discover the erratic bike rider is none other than their ancestor Uncle Martinus, who looks a lot like an older Martin in old-timey clothes!

episodes.name: Sealed with a Curse
episodes.overview: While trying to finish their family float for the school's fair and parade, the kids and Bat Pat discover a large, green creature making a mess of the library. The creature is not really a creature, but has been turned into one by a curse and is looking for a cure in Capistrano's spell books.

episodes.name: Dream a Little Dream
episodes.overview: Everyone in Fogville is having bad dreams - dreams that appear to belong to other people. After consulting with Capistrano Fog, the kids and Bat Pat are able to enter the dreams where they meet the mystical creature responsible for making people dream. He's called the Duke of Dreams and the gang tells him about his mistaken dream mix-ups.

episodes.name: Toothless Terror
episodes.overview: Something is flying around Fogville at night and scaring people who happen to be out after sundown and it seems to be a bat! Bat Pat leads the kids on a mission to find the wayward bat and teach him some manners. The trail leads Bat Pat and the kids to a haunted house where they discover Carl the vampire.

episodes.name: A Haunting Problem
episodes.overview: The kids' school is being haunted by a ghost named Walter Winthrop III. Although he's an adult, it seems that Walter never graduated from school because he could never focus in class and failed his final exam. Walter wants to take classes to help him finally pass his final exam, so Martin sets up a ghost school in his attic to teach Walter so he can graduate.

episodes.name: Cookie Crumbles
episodes.overview: A tremendous storm damages the secret bakery of the legendary Corky the Cookie Elf, the little creature who bakes the world's greatest cookies: Elfies. Corky vows to never make the delicious treats again… because he needs a new cookie maker. Leo loves Elfies and can't stand the idea that they might never be made again!

episodes.name: Moonstruck
episodes.overview: After numerous sightings of a furry beast in the Whispering Forest, "supernatural expert" Ivan Templeton is determined to catch the "menace" to make a name for himself. Hoping to prevent such a fate, the kids and Bat Pat search for the creature in the Whispering Forest and it turns out to be a werewolf...hanging out and dancing to music!? The werewolf is captured by Ivan.

episodes.name: Nothing to Laugh At
episodes.overview: The kids and Bat Pat are going on a school field trip to spend the night in a castle. Martin can't wait to sleep in a historical landmark, but his enthusiasm immediately disappears when he realises the castle is really a very creepy place. As the gang spends the day in the castle, they come to suspect the place may be haunted.

episodes.name: Slip, Slide and Away
episodes.overview: A song is putting people in a trance. The kids are led to the sewers and they find a lost mermaid.

episodes.name: Romeo and Zombiet
episodes.overview: Martin and Melissa are the lead rolls in the school play. A creature scares Melissa at rehearsals.

episodes.name: Unbearable
episodes.overview: Martin is kidnapped by a giant stuffed teddy bear. He needs Martin to help him sleep.

episodes.name: The Chosen Martin
episodes.overview: Martin tries to impress Melissa by taking martial arts classes. Master Waaaaaah can't rest until he train the 'Chosen One.'

episodes.name: Having a Ball
episodes.overview: Capistrano is hiding from a ghost in the library, Lady Gracefoot. She wants him to take her to the ball.

episodes.name: Queen of the Monkeys
episodes.overview: Tools are coming up missing. Bat Pat and the kids investigate, and it leads them to the Monkey Princess.

episodes.name: BFF - Bat Friends Forever
episodes.overview: A bat named Vlad shows up, claiming to be related to Bat Pat. When Bat Pat comes up missing, the kids realize Vlad is holding him hostage.

episodes.name: Roc of Ages
episodes.overview: Things come up missing, and the kids discover it's the fault of a giant mythical bird.

episodes.name: Footloose
episodes.overview: Amanda Dye is scared by something is stomping through Fogville leaving a green, stinky mist.

episodes.name: Just Desserts
episodes.overview: A Gingerbread man shows up in the clubhouse. He's hiding from the goblins who made him.

episodes.name: Voodoo That You Do
episodes.overview: Melissa and her friends play a game and are scared by a voodoo doll. The voodoo doll just wants to play too.

episodes.name: Kitty Cat Caper
episodes.overview: Leo's new hamster is a little strange. Agatha's cat turned her and her sisters into hamsters.

episodes.name: Scared Stiff
episodes.overview: Phil's action figures come to life, odd things happen at the Silver's. It's a poltergeist names Potts.

episodes.name: Be Your Elf
episodes.overview: A strange creature is scaring anyone who crosses its path. Leo has a new game, but it's hard.

episodes.name: What's Cooking
episodes.overview: A Chupacabra takes some of Elisabeth's blueberry pie. It is trying to win a cooking competition and asked Natty to join his team.

episodes.name: Blown Away
episodes.overview: The son of the Big Bad Wolf is practicing blowing down houses, and scares Melody.

episodes.name: Haunting Celebration
episodes.overview: Captain Salty haunts the streets of Fogville looking for his treasure according to the legend.

episodes.name: Seeing Double
episodes.overview: Janice encounters a creature that looks like her. Rebecca starts acting strange, but then later seems to be her old self.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Bat Pat follows the spooky and comical animated adventures of Bat Pat (who, in case you couldn't guess, is a talking bat) and his friends Martin, Leo and Rebecca Silver as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home of Fogville.
